A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Rian Johnson's Marxist take on Star Wars is not appreciated. Johnson's theme of demystification isn't just an attack against Skywalker and the force\, it is an attack against Chrisitanity. I love how Johnson invents a Jedi version of the bible just so he can burn it. It's pretty clear which side of the divide between good and evil Johnson stands on.
